languages.text: Проклятое оружие друкари, разящее врагов не лучами энергии или болт-снарядами, но кристаллическими цилиндрами, в которых заперт смертоносный вирус. Творец этой вещи явно желал не просто губить врагов, но делать это с максимальной жестокостью.

A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.
languages.original_text: Проклятое оружие друкари, разящее врагов не лучами энергии или болт-снарядами, но кристаллическими цилиндрами, в которых заперт смертоносный вирус. Творец этой вещи явно желал не просто губить врагов, но делать это с максимальной жестокостью.

traits.locale_text: A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, sealed within which is a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, sealed within which is a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

languages.text: Un arma Drukhari maldita. En vez de rayos de energía o cargas de bólter, lanza cilindros de cristal que encierran un virus letal contra sus enemigos. El creador de esta arma no se conformaba con la muerte de sus enemigos: tenía que ser la muerte más cruenta posible.
languages.original_text: A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

traits.locale_text: Un arma Drukhari maldita. En vez de rayos de energía o cargas de bólter, lanza cilindros de cristal que encierran un virus letal contra sus enemigos. El creador de esta arma no se conformaba con la muerte de sus enemigos: tenía que ser la muerte más cruenta posible.

languages.text: Une arme drukhari maudite. Plutôt que des rayons d'énergie ou des charges de bolter, elle tire des cylindres de cristal contenant un virus mortel. Son concepteur cruel ne voulait pas simplement tuer ses ennemis, mais les voir périr dans d'atroces souffrances.
languages.original_text: A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

traits.locale_text: Une arme drukhari maudite. Plutôt que des rayons d'énergie ou des charges de bolter, elle tire des cylindres de cristal contenant un virus mortel. Son concepteur cruel ne voulait pas simplement tuer ses ennemis, mais les voir périr dans d'atroces souffrances.

languages.text: 受诅咒的黑暗灵族武器。枪口射出的不是能量束或爆矢，而是含有致命病毒的水晶子弹。这把武器的制造者显然不想让对手轻轻松松死去，而要他们在死前受尽折磨。
languages.original_text: A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

traits.locale_text: 受诅咒的黑暗灵族武器。枪口射出的不是能量束或爆矢，而是含有致命病毒的水晶子弹。这把武器的制造者显然不想让对手轻轻松松死去，而要他们在死前受尽折磨。

languages.text: 呪われしデュカーリの兵器。エネルギー・ビームやボルト・チャージではなく、致命的なウイルスを封じ込めたクリスタル・シリンダーで敵を攻撃する。この武器の製作者が、敵をただ殺す以上のもの、すなわち、可能な限り残酷な死をもたらすものを求めていたのは間違いないだろう。
languages.original_text: A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

traits.locale_text: 呪われしデュカーリの兵器。エネルギー・ビームやボルト・チャージではなく、致命的なウイルスを封じ込めたクリスタル・シリンダーで敵を攻撃する。この武器の製作者が、敵をただ殺す以上のもの、すなわち、可能な限り残酷な死をもたらすものを求めていたのは間違いないだろう。

languages.text: Eine verfluchte Drukhari-Waffe. Statt Energiestrahlen oder Boltladungen feuert es Kristallzylinder ab, die ein tödliches Virus in sich tragen. Der Erfinder dieser Waffe war offenkundig nicht allein darauf aus, den Feind zu töten. Es sollte auch noch ein möglichst grausamer Tod sein.
languages.original_text: A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

traits.locale_text: Eine verfluchte Drukhari-Waffe. Statt Energiestrahlen oder Boltladungen feuert es Kristallzylinder ab, die ein tödliches Virus in sich tragen. Der Erfinder dieser Waffe war offenkundig nicht allein darauf aus, den Feind zu töten. Es sollte auch noch ein möglichst grausamer Tod sein.

languages.text: Lanetli bir Drukhari silahı. Düşmanlarına enerji ışınları ya da yıldırımlar yerine, içlerine ölümcül bir virüsün hapsedildiği kristal silindirlerle saldırır. Bu cihazın mucidi her kimse, düşmanlarının salt ölümlerinin fazlasının peşinde olduğu açık. Belli ki acılar içinde kıvrana kıvrana ölmelerini hedefliyormuş.
languages.original_text: A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.
